hero.title: AI-Native Automation Specialist & Swiss Tax Expert
hero.subtitle: Finance Analyst FP&A at Johnson & Johnson | Founder of Taxed GmbH | 13+ years leading automation initiatives for global teams and Swiss expatriates with proven Fortune 500 results.

services.section_subtitle: AI-Native Automation, Swiss Tax Expertise, and Financial Analytics

automation.title: AI-Native Automation
automation.description: Transform business processes with next-generation AI workflows, vector databases, and LLM orchestration. Specialized in regulated environments, I bridge traditional finance with intelligent automation using UiPath, Python, and custom AI solutions. Proven track record at Fortune 500 level with significant ROI.

tax.title: Swiss Tax & Fiduciary Services
tax.description: Expert Swiss tax consulting through Taxed GmbH for residents and expatriates. Comprehensive fiduciary services including bookkeeping, VAT settlements, tax returns, and compliance. Serving SMEs across Switzerland with high client retention and satisfaction.

analytics.title: Financial Analytics & FP&A
analytics.description: Advanced financial analytics with 99.5% accuracy in cost calculations. Real-time inventory reporting, WW transfer pricing management, and predictive modeling. Expert in Power BI, Alteryx, and Python for data-driven decision making at enterprise scale.

consulting.title: Finance & Process Optimization
consulting.description: Strategic finance and process consulting leveraging 13+ years at Fortune 500 level. Specialized in affiliate gross profit optimization, spin-off calculations, cost-centre controlling, and global process standardization. Proven cost reduction and efficiency gains.

portfolio.title: Featured Projects & Achievements
portfolio.subtitle: Real-world impact at Fortune 500 level and entrepreneurial success

project1.title: FAA PII & Standard Cost Automation (J&J)
project1.description: Developed and maintained automated cost calculation systems achieving 99.5% accuracy for FAA PII & standard costs. Streamlined affiliate gross profit analysis, improving reporting efficiency and reducing manual processing time significantly across global operations.
project1.technologies: Power BI, Python, Alteryx, SQL Server, Excel

project2.title: WW Transfer Pricing Management
project2.description: Managed worldwide transfer pricing maintenance across multiple countries, ensuring compliance and optimization. Automated real-time inventory reporting and days of supply calculations, enhancing inventory accuracy and supporting strategic decision-making.
project2.technologies: Power BI, Python, SQL, Excel, Automation Tools

project3.title: Taxed GmbH - Fiduciary Services
project3.description: Founded and operate Taxed GmbH (2021), providing comprehensive fiduciary, tax, and business consulting services. Strong revenue growth in first 2 years, serving multiple SME clients across Switzerland with high retention and satisfaction rates.
project3.technologies: Business Management, Tax Compliance, Fiduciary Services, Client Relations

testimonials.title: Client Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: What clients and colleagues say about working with me

testimonial1.name: Sarah Chen
testimonial1.text: Emanuel transformed our financial reporting process, reducing manual work by 80% and significantly improving accuracy. His expertise in automation and Power BI has been invaluable to our finance team. The 99.5% accuracy in cost calculations speaks to his attention to detail.

testimonial2.name: Marcus Weber
testimonial2.text: Excellent fiduciary services for our Swiss operations. Emanuel's deep understanding of Swiss tax law combined with his automation expertise has saved us considerable time and money. The service quality at Taxed GmbH is outstanding - highly recommended!

testimonial3.name: Dr. Anna Keller
testimonial3.text: Working with Emanuel on our AI integration project was exceptional. His ability to bridge technical implementation with business requirements led to solutions that exceeded expectations. His Fortune 500 experience and automation leadership since 2012 make him a trusted partner.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: AI-Native Automation Specialist & Swiss Tax Expert with Fortune 500 Leadership Experience
about.headline: Bridging Technology and Business Excellence
about.bio1: I'm a Finance Analyst FP&A at DePuy Synthes GmbH (Johnson & Johnson) since 2017, where I've led automation initiatives since 2012. With over 13 years of combined experience in finance automation and tax consulting, I specialize in transforming complex business processes into intelligent, AI-powered solutions. My work spans global operations, managing WW transfer pricing, achieving 99.5% accuracy in FAA PII & standard cost calculations, and delivering substantial cost savings through automation.
about.bio2: In 2021, I founded Taxed GmbH (100% ownership), a fiduciary services company serving SMEs across Switzerland and international markets. I hold a Master of Arts in Economics-Finance from the University of Aberdeen and completed an international exchange at the University of Wisconsin-La Crosse. Certified in UiPath RPA, Alteryx, and Power BI, I'm also a Royal Yachting Association Day Skipper. When I'm not automating processes, you'll find me sailing or contributing to community projects like the Weissenstein Hiking Trail.
about.certifications: UiPath RPA Developer • Alteryx Designer Core • Power BI Data Analyst • RYA Day Skipper

footer.description: Transforming businesses through intelligent automation and strategic tax optimization.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about my services

questions.question: Do you work with international clients?
questions.answer: Yes! I work with clients globally, particularly those with operations in Switzerland or requiring Swiss tax expertise. My automation consulting services are available worldwide, and I have experience with multinational corporations and remote collaboration.

questions.question: What's your typical project timeline?
questions.answer: Project timelines vary based on scope and complexity. A typical automation project ranges from 2-12 weeks, while tax consulting engagements can be ongoing. I provide detailed timelines during our initial consultation after understanding your specific requirements.

questions.question: How do you charge for your services?
questions.answer: I offer flexible pricing models including hourly rates, fixed-price projects, and retainer agreements. Pricing depends on project complexity, timeline, and deliverables. Contact me for a custom quote tailored to your needs.

questions.question: What automation platforms do you specialize in?
questions.answer: I specialize in UiPath, Power Automate, Python automation, and custom solutions. I have extensive experience with RPA (Robotic Process Automation), AI integration, workflow automation, and data analytics using Power BI.

questions.question: Can you help with Swiss tax compliance for expatriates?
questions.answer: Absolutely! I specialize in Swiss tax consulting for expatriates, helping navigate complex Swiss tax regulations, optimize tax strategies, and ensure compliance across multiple jurisdictions. I'm co-founder of Taxed GmbH, which focuses specifically on this area.

questions.question: Do you offer training or knowledge transfer?
questions.answer: Yes! I believe in empowering teams. Most projects include knowledge transfer sessions, documentation, and training to ensure your team can maintain and expand upon the solutions I deliver.

questions.question: What industries do you serve?
questions.answer: I have extensive experience in pharmaceuticals (Finance Analyst FP&A at DePuy Synthes/Johnson & Johnson since 2017), finance automation, tax consulting (Taxed GmbH), and enterprise operations. My expertise spans Fortune 500 multinational corporations, SMEs, and individual clients requiring Swiss tax expertise. My automation and process optimization skills apply across all sectors.

questions.question: How do I get started?
questions.answer: Simply reach out via the contact form, email (me@eflury.com), or phone (+41 79 910 77 87). We'll schedule an initial consultation to discuss your needs, and I'll provide a proposal outlining scope, timeline, and pricing.
